lines.text: Put the gun down before I take it from you.
Put the gun down? Put the gun down? I'm gonna put the gun down your fuckin' throat!

[after the hooker reaches a very loud orgasm]
Wow.

[She slaps him hard across the face]
More!
More? What do you mean, "more"? I don't have more!
[Loomis orders his men to bury his newlywed wife alive]
You don't think I'm overreacting, do you?
You shot me! I can't believe you shot me in the leg! That's very dangerous!

[yelling down to Dani, who is hanging upside down on a rope from the helicopter]
How the hell are ya? Hey! You know what I like to do in the morning? I like to dunk my donuts into my coffee! How 'bout you?

[to a little girl after he just killed her parents]
Trust me, sweetheart, you're much better off.
You just got out of the joint, and now you're thinking with your joint.

[to Dani]
So, you jump out of helicopters, huh? What are you, made out of? Fuckin' rubber?

[after finding the yacht's time bomb too late, to the camera]
Fuck me.
